thread.section_title: Gardner-White Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gardner-White Furniture | www.gardner-white.com | 8 of 236
thread.title: Gary Stem
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Gary Stem

author: Gary Stem
title: Gary Stem
text: Our entire transaction with Gardner White was positive, from the salesman, to the confirmation email after delivery. We purchased a mattress at 12-30 pm & it was delivered by 4:40 that day. Everyone was very professional and helpful. We'll definitely buy from them again.
